title: New to the game. and for some reason i cant play the game.
body: Yes, I am brand new to league of legends. Once I got the game download it ask me to go to the tutorial and i click no on accident. Once I got on i saw i could play the tutorial under the pvp and all. once I lauched one of the tutorial i goes to a black screen. I wait there for a bit and then it tell me its disconnected it the same for when i tried to go to my first match i click my play and all to start but once the game launch it disconnected me. Is there any way i could fix this please tell me. I would like to try league of legends for the first time. Thank you for the help if u responed to this message.

replies.body:
Hey Blackwing Ace, 

First and foremost, welcome to League of Legends where your experience will be something like this: http://imgur.com/TcPvsmO :D Second, since you are getting a black screen you should try Riots Connection KB. It fixes the issue your client has when it can't connect to your computer. 

Connection KB: http://riot.com/12B7oac

I'll be on for a bit, so if this doesn't work after following all the steps, reach out.
